# First Physio - LLMs.txt
# https://firstphysio.in

## About
First Physio is a premier physiotherapy clinic located in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India.
Founded by Dr. Augustine Joseph, the clinic specializes in evidence-based physiotherapy treatment.

## Services
- Musculoskeletal Physiotherapy
- Sports Injury Rehabilitation
- Neurological Rehabilitation
- Geriatric Physiotherapy
- Post-Surgical Rehabilitation
- Pain Management

## Conditions Treated
- Back Pain (lower back, upper back, disc problems, sciatica)
- Neck Pain (cervical pain, whiplash, tech neck)
- Shoulder Pain (frozen shoulder, rotator cuff)
- Knee Pain (ligament injuries, arthritis)
- Hip Pain
- Sports Injuries

## Programs
- Total Knee Replacement Rehab
- Ergonomic Assessment
- Sports Performance Enhancement
- Senior Mobility Program
- Post-Surgical Rehabilitation

## Blog
- Physiotherapy Isn't a Luxury: 5 Reasons Why Physiotherapy Needs to Be Part of Your Fitness and Health Plans
- Exercising the Right Way: Why Physiotherapy Guidance Makes All the Difference

## Hours
Monday - Sunday: 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM
